data.title: Visit & Events
data.meta_description: Visit Philander Smith University and learn about our programs, talk to our faculty about your interests, and see what life as a Philanderian is all about.
data.text:
Come get a feel for Philander Smith University.

Learn about our programs, talk to our faculty about your interests, and see what life as a Philanderian is all about.

We welcome our prospective students, their families and groups to visit our campus. Campus visits are designed to give you an in-depth look at what Philander Smith University has to offer:

Schedule to talk with a Admissions representative who will share who we are and where we are headed.

Go on walking tour of our campus led by a student tour guide.

Meet current students who will give you a personal perspective on college life.

To schedule a tour, call 501-370-5221 or email admissions@philander.edu!

Dr. Cynthia A. Bond Hopson

Room and Board

You Belong In Little Rock

Known as the "Natural State," Arkansas is heralded for the beauty of its natural landscape, clear lakes and streams, wildlife and a sundry of outdoor adventures and activities. Philander Smith University is nestled near the progressive epicenter of Little Rock-the thriving capital city of this charming Southern state. Among one of America's most affordable cities and home to growing business, governmental, non-profit and medical entities, Little Rock is the ideal setting to dream big and make those dreams come true.

The University's mission is to graduate academically accomplished students, grounded as advocates for social justice, determined to change the world for the better.
